original_text: They stripped her naked, took away her sons and daughters and killed her with the sword. She became a byword among women, and punishment was inflicted on her.
korean_text: 그들이 그의 하체를 드러내고 그의 자녀를 빼앗으며 칼로 그를 죽여 여인들에게 이야깃거리가 되게 하였나니 이는 그들이 그에게 심판을 행함이니라

sentences.original_text: took away her sons and daughters
and killed her with the sword.
She became a byword among women,
and punishment was inflicted on her.
